title: Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: When using a ServletRequestListener, the DispatcherType returned after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch() is incorrect, showing as REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
OB: After invoking AsyncContext.dispatch() within a ServletRequestListener, the DispatcherType retrieved from the ServletRequest is incorrectly displayed as REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
EB: After invoking AsyncContext.dispatch() within a ServletRequestListener, the expected behavior is for the DispatcherType retrieved from the ServletRequest to correctly display as ASYNC, aligning with the asynchronous dispatch.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Define a ServletRequestListener. 2. Inside the listener, perform an AsyncContext.dispatch(). 3. Retrieve the DispatcherType from the ServletRequest and observe that it displays as REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
